# Graphs (networks) of relations


- get a representation of the individuals in a `Genealogy` as a Julia `SimpleValueGraph`:

```{julia}
using GedCom
root = pwd() |> dirname |> dirname
f = joinpath(root, "test", "data", "pres2020.ged")
gen = genealogy_g5(f)
gengraph = genealogyGraph(gen)
```
